name: Rules of Engagement
description:
Interstellar War!

In the late twenty-fourth century, the Federated Worlds need a bigger and better space fleet than ever before. Exploration continues. Hostile aliens abound. Rebellion ferments, and the UDP worlds have just declared war!

 

More ships, faster ships, stronger ships. Better and brighter crews. And, to command them, the best leaders, tacticians and strategist in the known galaxy! 

 

Choosing Your Enemies - Each species, human or alien, has its own unique physiology, characteristics and history.

 

Starship Design - Equip your fleet with a multitude of devices, armor and missiles

 

Ship-to-Ship Combat - Select your target and choose the best weapon to seek it out and blast it.

 

Stellar Navigation - Pilot your flagship and send orders to the rest of the captains of your fleet.

 

Millions of Missions

  • Over twenty detail missions already providided. You'll command convoys, sorties, and last-ditch defenses. Role-play your commander through all ranks, receiving well-deserved decorations on the way to ultimate Naval command.
  • A complete integrated mission builder. Design your own spaceships, alien enemies, subordinate captains, and even newly discovered star systems! Then drop your commander into the middle of the latest crisis! In the vastness of interstellar space, the possibilities are endless.

Interlocks with Breach 2 - When the time comes for a boarding party or commando raid, you can, at your option, use the Interlocking Game System to fight the full battle with Breach 2. The experience is automatically credited to your Rules of Engagement commander.
